defects.name: Cracked Screen
defects.description: cracked display with visible damage broken glass touch not responding screen shattered spider web pattern fracture

defects.name: Screen Scratch
defects.description: surface scratch on display minor damage to screen protective layer scratched glass light marks

defects.name: Battery Drain
defects.description: battery draining fast rapid power loss short battery life phone dies quickly poor backup

defects.name: Battery Swelling
defects.description: swollen battery bulging back panel battery expansion physical deformation dangerous

defects.name: Charging Port Issue
defects.description: charging port not working cable loose connection problem won't charge port damaged intermittent charging

defects.name: Physical Dent
defects.description: dent on body physical deformation bent frame damaged casing structural damage corner dent

defects.name: Back Panel Damage
defects.description: back glass broken rear panel cracked back cover damaged shattered back

defects.name: Water Damage
defects.description: water damage liquid spill moisture corrosion wet device submerged liquid indicator triggered rust

defects.name: Broken Hinge
defects.description: laptop hinge broken loose hinge screen wobbles connection damaged lid problem creaking hinge

defects.name: Keyboard Malfunction
defects.description: keyboard keys not working sticky keys multiple key presses keyboard problem typing issue key failure

defects.name: Overheating
defects.description: device overheating excessive heat thermal issue hot to touch burning smell fan noise cooling problem

defects.name: Audio Issues
defects.description: no sound audio not working speaker problem crackling sound microphone issue distorted audio

defects.name: Camera Defect
defects.description: camera not working blurry photos focus issue lens crack camera malfunction black screen

defects.name: Button Damage
defects.description: power button stuck volume buttons not responding home button broken tactile issue

defects.name: Display Flickering
defects.description: screen flickering display issue brightness problem ghost touch dead pixels backlight bleeding
